alert.note: Alert for Forsyth; Person (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 09 at 3:15PM EST until January 10 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy rain will result in considerable runoff that may lead to areas of flooding. * WHERE...A portion of central North Carolina, including the following counties, Alamance, Anson, Chatham, Davidson, Durham, Forsyth, Franklin, Granville, Guilford, Lee, Montgomery, Moore, Orange, Person, Randolph, Richmond, Stanly, Vance, Wake and Warren. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
